cricket.title: CRICKET
cricket.quote: You don’t win or lose the games because of the 11 you select. You win or lose with that those 11 do on the field.” – Rahul Dravid
cricket.description: Cricket is a super popular sport played with a bat and ball. This game is played by two teams of 11 players each. It's all about scoring runs and getting the other team out. It is played on a pitch in a well-maintained field for the same purpose. There are different formats like Test matches and One Day Internationals. It's a game full of excitement, strategy, and amazing moments.
